id.description: Unique identifier of the email template.

body_preview.description: Preview of the email template body.

created_at.description: Date and time when the email template was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the email template was last updated.

last_used_at.description: Date and time when the email template was last used.

archived_at.description: Date and time when the email template was archived.

shared.description: Indicates whether the email template is shared within the organization.

open_tracking_enabled.description: Indicates whether open tracking is enabled for the email template.

click_tracking_enabled.description: Indicates whether click tracking is enabled for the email template.

cadence_template.description: Cadence template linked to this email template.

sent_emails.description: Number of emails sent using this template.

views.description: Number of views generated by emails using this template.

clicks.description: Number of clicks generated by emails using this template.

replies.description: Number of replies received for emails using this template.

bounces.description: Number of bounced emails using this template.

id.description: Unique identifier of the owner of the email template.

_href.description: Link to the owner of the email template.

id.description: Unique identifier of the team template associated with the email template.

_href.description: Link to the team template associated with the email template.

attachments.description: Links to any attachments associated with the email template.

id.description: Unique identifier of the group associated with the email template.

_href.description: Link to the group associated with the email template.

items.description: Tags associated with the email template.
